text: You can send optional information to Data Veracity from an Analysis or Aggregation agent, provided an Error Code has been defined. Additional information can be linked to this error code using the udrAddError APL. For more information about udrAddError , see UDR Functions | udrAddError . Here is an example: Example - Error case linked to error code using APL code In this example, the "CALL ID ERROR" is defined as the Error Code name. udrAddError( input, "CALL ID ERROR", "The callId: " + input.callId + ", Calling number: " + input.anum ); Note! Use the udrClearErrors function to clear a UDR's errors. For more information about udrClearErrors , see UDR Functions | udrClearErrors .
title: Data Veracity - Attaching Information to an Error Code - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
